issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

MacBook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Early 2015)
2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
8 GB 1867 MHz DDR3

comments.body: I've fixed it the issue was from provision profile is invalid , i created a new one and its works fine now , but the console in appc should show such error XD i had to spend all day searching for solution

Hello [~jackSparrow],

Thanks for your feedback. Which error are you experiencing now? It would be great if you can share your environmental details and error logs here.
Issue is fixed in the latest studio and SDK.
